title: What is a good chemistry tutor for class 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: A good chemistry tutor is one that not only understands the negatives and the plus points of a student but also makes enough efforts to help them improve. Understanding chemistry concepts can be difficult if you hire an incompetent teacher. Every student is different and requires different study plan. If you are on an outlook to find the best chemistry tutor for class 12, then I would recommend the chemistry tutors available at Agarwal Academy. All the teachers undergo a strict screening process, so you can trust each of the chemistry tutors listed there. Following are few advantages of this academy: Experienced and dedicated home tutorsVery punctual tutorVery disciplined teachersCompetitive fees and flexible payment optionResult oriented home tuitionI Must this this academy is Top Home Tutor in South Delhi.
